description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen called ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen for managing orders overview in a frontend app. It includes sub-widgets for headers and notes, and references theming and responsiveness.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the manager orders overview screen, providing a scaffold with an app bar and list of placeholder notes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the screen, including header and placeholder notes.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A reusable widget for displaying a section header with an icon and decorated background.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the row containing the icon and the title text with decoration.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A widget for displaying informational notes with an icon and styled container.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the container with icon and text, styled with shadows and padding.
